mapper.insert: insert into schedule ( title, context, user_id, created_date, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time ) values ( #{title}, #{context}, #{userId}, #{createdDate}, #{scheduleStartTime}, #{scheduleEndTime} )
mapper.select: select id, title, context, user_id as userId, created_date as createdDate, schedule_start_time as scheduleStartTime, schedule_end_time as scheduleEndTime from schedule
